reporting-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

description.narrative: The project manager acts as the New Zealand Aid Programme’s representative in Bamyan liaising with contractors, non-governmental and other organisations and local government officials. He provides information and advice to head office in Wellington on programme implementation, compliance and community issues.
